title: About Randi
text:
I graduated magna cum laude with a Bachelors of Science in Mathematics from Portland State University in 2022 with an emphasis on statistics. Since most of my undergrad was during COVID-19 lock down I‚Äôve become proficient at collaborating remotely. I ran remote study groups through discord, participated in the GIS (Geographic Information Systems) club, spoke virtually at G.I.S. in Action, and in the summer of 2021 created my first blog.
Currently I am looking for work as a data analyst, data scientist, or a machine learning engineer. My hope is that this blog will not only showcase my technical skills in these areas, but also my determination, adaptability, and perseverance.

Personal
ü©∞ Before I went to back to school to get my degree in mathematics I was a dancer. I have trained pre-professionally at Dance Vision and The SanFrancisco Conservatory of Dance. My favorite dance styles are ballet, hip-hop, and modern, but I love all kinds of dance and will try any form of movement. I unfortunately an not able to dance as much anymore due to a car accident in 2014 which required me to have two separate jaw surgeries in 2016 and 2017.
üáØüáµ In high school I took Japanese, and have been appreciative of the culture ever since. Recently I bought plane tickets to visit Japan for the first time for my 30th birthday in 2023. While I‚Äôd still consider myself a beginner at speaking, writing, and reading the language, I am very much looking forward to the experience.
üèÄ I enjoy most sports, but especially soccor and basketball. It‚Äôs a great way to do hobby statistics, and get rowdy üòú. Growing up both of my sisters, and dad played basketball so I watched a lot of games, and I still enjoy watching the NBA and WNBA. My favorite NBA teams are the Portland Trail Blazers, Phoenix Suns, and New Orleans Pelicans.
üéÆ I have a switch, and when I am not working on my blog I play Stardew Valley, Cat Cafe Manager, Unpacking, Mario Carts, Pokemon Legends Arceus, Animal Crossing, Just Dance, and most recently Pokemon Scarlet.

üìöBooks I‚Äôm Currently Readingüìö
Basketball Analytics
Etiquette Guide to Japan
Weapons of Math Destruction

üé∂Music I‚Äôm Currently Listening Toüé∂
Face Your Fears - Crazy Ex Girlfriend
I Owe You Nothing
Never Thought - Mel Bryant
Pudgy - Smino
Supremacy - Muse

üé•Movies I‚Äôve Watched Recentlyüé•

X

title: Randi Bolt
text:
This website is currently under construction so be sure to check out the links below and my old blog which showcases all of my academic and personal projects from undergrad.
I post bimonthly about a range of topics that are related to data science, statistics, mathematics, or machine learning. Check out my journey, and feel free to leave my posts comments. I‚Äôd love to hear from you!
Thanks for stopping by, and please enjoy!
